availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Pulaski County, Kentucky, merchant. Kentucky native. Married to Mary Ann Light Doolin on February 9, 1864. Merchant in Pulaski County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Pulaski County, District 1, p. 163.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Pendleton County Marriages, Film #001912849, p. 10.
Find A Grave, "James Doolin (March 4, 1830-October 26, 1895)," Memorial #12554688, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/12554688 (accessed June 14, 2016).
